Tag.description: To add or update tag, provide both key and value. To delete tag, provide only tag key to be deleted.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: ApplicationDescription
properties.description: Application Description, should be between 1 and 2048 characters.

type.description: Application Description, should be between 1 and 2048 characters.

properties.name: ApplicationName
properties.description: Application Name, should be between 1 and 256 characters.

type.description: Application Name, should be between 1 and 256 characters.

properties.name: RoleArn
properties.description: The ARN of the role that the web application assumes when it interacts with AWS IoT Core. For more info on configuring this attribute, see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/apireference/API_iotfleethub_CreateApplication.html#API_iotfleethub_CreateApplication_RequestSyntax

type.description: The ARN of the role that the web application assumes when it interacts with AWS IoT Core. For more info on configuring this attribute, see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/apireference/API_iotfleethub_CreateApplication.html#API_iotfleethub_CreateApplication_RequestSyntax

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the application.

type.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the application.

properties.name: ApplicationLastUpdateDate
properties.description: When the Application was last updated

type.description: When the Application was last updated

properties.name: ApplicationState
properties.description: The current state of the application.

type.description: The current state of the application.

properties.name: ErrorMessage
properties.description: A message indicating why Create or Delete Application failed.

type.description: A message indicating why Create or Delete Application failed.

properties.name: SsoClientId
properties.description: The AWS SSO application generated client ID (used with AWS SSO APIs).

type.description: The AWS SSO application generated client ID (used with AWS SSO APIs).
